name: BreakoutBattle
description:
BreakoutBattle, a game where you and your friend can play breakout against each other. Player one uses 'a' and 'd' to move left and right, while player two uses the arrow keys.

Planned Features:
  • Delay before start
  • Restart game
  • Stats
  • Settings menu
  • Change controls in settings
  • More comply field
  • Items
  • Online mode
Future of the game

At the moment, I don't know what will happen to this project. I coded it in a challenge an it is just a prototype. I don't even know whether I should work on those planned features, because I also work at other projects.
In case you want to have those features, please leave a comment.
